1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Replace sublists.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Replace
6  ( Replace,
7    replaceAll,
8    replaceFirst,
9    replaceLast,
10    replaceBegin,
11    replaceEnd,
12    -- $Operators
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Data.List  as List
16
17-- | Type of replace function, /from/ → /to/ → /xs/ → /ys/.
18type Replace a = [a] -> [a] -> [a] -> [a]
19
20-- | Replace all occurrences.
21--
22-- >>> replaceAll "br" "BR" "abracadabra"
23-- "aBRacadaBRa"
24--
25-- >>> replaceAll "ba" "BA" "abracadabra"
26-- "abracadabra"
27--
28-- >>> replaceAll "" "BR" "abracadabra"
29-- "abracadabra"
30
31replaceAll :: (Eq a) => Replace a
32replaceAll from to = loop where
33    loop [] = []
34    loop xxs@(x:xs)
35        | xxs =* from   = to ++ loop (dropLength from xxs)
36        | otherwise     = x : loop xs
37
38-- | Replace first occurrence.
39--
40-- >>> replaceFirst "br" "BR" "abracadabra"
41-- "aBRacadabra"
42--
43-- >>> replaceFirst "ba" "BA" "abracadabra"
44-- "abracadabra"
45--
46-- >>> replaceFirst "" "BR" "abracadabra"
47-- "abracadabra"
48
49replaceFirst :: (Eq a) => Replace a
50replaceFirst from to = loop where
51    loop [] = []
52    loop xxs@(x:xs)
53        | xxs =* from   = to ++ dropLength from xxs
54        | otherwise     = x : loop xs
55
56-- | Replace last occurrence.
57--
58-- >>> replaceLast "br" "BR" "abracadabra"
59-- "abracadaBRa"
60--
61-- >>> replaceLast "ba" "BA" "abracadabra"
62-- "abracadabra"
63--
64-- >>> replaceLast "" "BR" "abracadabra"
65-- "abracadabra"
66
67replaceLast :: (Eq a) => [a] -> [a] -> [a] -> [a]
68replaceLast = replaceReverse replaceFirst
69
70-- | Replace occurrence at the beginning.
71--
72-- >>> replaceBegin "ab" "AB" "abracadabra"
73-- "ABracadabra"
74--
75-- >>> replaceBegin "br" "BR" "abracadabra"
76-- "abracadabra"
77--
78-- >>> replaceBegin "" "BR" "abracadabra"
79-- "abracadabra"
80
81replaceBegin :: (Eq a) => Replace a
82replaceBegin from to xs
83    | xs =* from   = to ++ dropLength from xs
84    | otherwise    = xs
85
86-- | Replace occurrence at the end.
87--
88-- >>> replaceEnd "ra" "RA" "abracadabra"
89-- "abracadabRA"
90--
91-- >>> replaceEnd "br" "BR" "abracadabra"
92-- "abracadabra"
93--
94-- >>> replaceEnd "" "BR" "abracadabra"
95-- "abracadabra"
96
97replaceEnd :: (Eq a) => Replace a
98replaceEnd = replaceReverse replaceBegin
99
100
101-- ----------------------  Utility
102
103(=*) :: (Eq a) => [a] -> [a] -> Bool
104_  =* []    = False
105xs =* from  = from `List.isPrefixOf` xs
106
107dropLength :: [a] -> [a] -> [a]
108dropLength = drop . length
109
110replaceReverse :: (Eq a) => Replace a -> Replace a
111replaceReverse rep from to xs = reverse $ rep from' to' xs' where
112    from' = reverse from
113    to'   = reverse to
114    xs'   = reverse xs
115
